dcterms:creator: A. Prest
C. Leistner
J. Civera
C. Schmid
V. Ferrari
dcterms:description: YouTube-Object v1.0 (YTOv1) consists of various videos collected from YouTube, segmented into short clips. It includes 155 videos across 10 categories, with a total of 5507 shorts and 571,089 frames. Some frames have bounding box annotations for validation and testing.
dcterms:title: YouTube-Object v1.0 (YTOv1)

dcterms:creator: Vi Kalogeiton
V. Ferrari
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: YouTube-Object v2.2 (YTOv2.2) is an extension of YTOv1, consisting of 722,040 frames across 155 videos divided into 9 categories. It has a larger number of bounding box annotations compared to YTOv1, with 2,667 bounding boxes in the test set.
dcterms:title: YouTube-Object v2.2 (YTOv2.2)
